name: MAGICAL -Mountain Chapter
description:
A Mountain that should've never been.

Follow Arya and Aya as they head out to a mountain that appeared out of nowhere? Well that doesn't make sense...

Maybe there is something happening there? A malicious cult? An old being that is trying to eat the world? Or probably some weird guys just making a lot of noise? Anyway, It can make for a cool story to tell at MAGICAL HQ Cafeteria once it is all over.

(This game contains pixelated blood)

For Magical Girl Game Jam #7

(Post-Jam and Final Update:  April 2th 2023)
